description:
Saki Tenhouin is the queen of Sainan High School.  She`s the richest, the most popular, the prettiest, the vainest... you get the picture.  She`s also the most jealous of Lala when she finds out that her popularity is on the rise amongst the other students (due in part to her sex appeal).  But Miss Saki will not be out done! She challenges Lala to the Miss Sainan Competition.  However, it`s not a good idea to send an alien princess a challenge with an arrow stuck through it.  It`s an even worse idea to try to kidnap her fiancé to ensure that she shows up.  Refusing to be made a fool of, Saki will learn Lala`s secret and try to destroy her in the queen`s challenge.  If she can get out of the escape pod that is...
Source: crunchyroll
